title: Block Blast!
summary:
Enter the world of Block Blast, a fun and free block puzzle game where every move challenges your brain and strategy, rewarding you with satisfying crush effects as you blast cubes away. Whether you're seeking offline relaxation or looking to enhance your logic skills, Block Blast delivers an engaging puzzle experience.

üåü Why You'll Love Block Blast
üî∏ Vibrant Puzzle Adventure: Match colorful blocks on an 8x8 board, solve logic puzzles, and watch the cubes crush in a cascade of color.
üîπ Strategic Combos & Streaks:
Use your brain to clear multiple lines of blocks in one move for powerful combos. Maintain your streaks to achieve massive scores!
üî∏ Casual Yet Challenging: Play at your own pace, relax your brain, or apply deep logic strategies to beat your highest score.
üîπ Offline Fun, No WiFi Needed: Enjoy free block puzzle game anytime and anywhere, perfect for endless fun on-the-go.

üí• Features of Block Blast
‚óè Puzzle Gameplay: Strategically place blocks and cubes, match colors, and solve each challenging level.
‚óè Adventure Mode: Take on progressively challenging puzzles, each level with unique theme jigsaw and visual styles.
‚óè Daily Challenges: Keep your brain sharp with daily logic puzzles and earn exclusive achievements.
‚óè Optimized for All Devices: Smooth, seamless gameplay experience with minimal memory usage‚Äîperfect for phones and tablets.

üéÆ How to Play
‚óè Drag & Match: Strategically place cubes on the 8x8 board.
‚óè Crush & Score: Complete rows or columns to crush blocks away and earn points.
‚óè Chase Combos: Plan your moves and trigger massive combos for bonus points.
‚óè Stay Strategic: Apply logic and strategy to prevent your board from filling up.

‚ú® Pro Tips for Puzzle Masters
‚óè Plan Ahead: Visualize your moves to keep the board open for larger cubes.
‚óè Maximize Combos: Match multiple rows and blocks simultaneously to boost your combos.
‚óè Master the Streak: Consistent clears will maintain your fun streaks and enhance your score rewards.

üî• Jump into the Free Block Puzzle Game!
Ready to test your brain, sharpen your logic, and enjoy hours of offline puzzle fun? Download Block Blast now and embark on an unforgettable block puzzle adventure.
recentChanges:
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- We actively gather and analyze feedback to steer the improvements in our game. We're committed to bringing you the finest block puzzle gaming, coupled with an unparalleled playing experience.

title: Fortnite
summary:
Fortnite is back! Be the last player standing in Battle Royale, Zero Build, Blitz and OG, carry your squad to victory in fast-paced Reload, build your own adventures in LEGO¬Æ Fortnite, or headline a concert in Fortnite Festival ‚Äî it's all here.

Play thousands of free developer-made islands with your friends, including tycoons, deathruns, zombie survival, and more
recentChanges:
Sunshine Meets Snow in Winterfest '25
Open a free present every day by the hearth of the fireplace in Winterfest 2025, which brings new festive Outfits to the shop and ice-cold unvaults to Battle Royale, like the Blizzard Grenade and Snowball Launcher.

FORTNITE | BLEACH Power Unleashed.
Wield Ichigo‚Äôs Dual Zangetsu and loudly yell ‚ÄúGetsuga Jujisho!‚Äù at your screen - we won‚Äôt judge.
Or use the Hollow mask and fire your Cero.
Now live in Blitz.

title: Block Crush!
summary:
Welcome to Block Crush ‚Äî a logic-driven puzzle and brain teaser built as a block puzzle and wood block game around pattern solving, spatial reasoning, and clear board strategy.
In this blocks game, every block placement affects the entire puzzle grid as you fit blocks, clear space, and plan ahead through smart decisions. Inspired by classic block puzzle logic, this wood puzzle blends strategy with clean wooden visuals.

ü™µ Relaxing Yet Strategic
The wooden puzzle board supports both block puzzle clarity and wood block puzzle thinking, making blocks and empty tiles easy to read. Each move is a logic step: track available space, compare block geometry, predict outcomes, and avoid creating locked areas. Fans of structured block game planning and long-run puzzle problem-solving will feel at home. Whether you enjoy a wood block game or a deeper block puzzle, each run rewards steady control of blocks.

üß© How to Play This Block Puzzle Game
Place blocks and wood blocks onto the grid to fill space and complete full rows or columns.
Clear blocks to refresh the board state and maintain control of the grid.
Every clear opens space for better block placement and longer runs.
Analyze shapes, plan ahead, and manage the board with calm, classic block logic.
Play offline anytime ‚Äî no timer, no pressure, just pure block puzzle strategy.

üéÆ Key Features
‚óè Clear Block Grid: A clean wooden board designed for reading block patterns and planning placements.
‚óè Satisfying Block Clears: Smooth clearing effects that reinforce correct block decisions.
‚óè Strategic Depth: Use spatial reasoning to prevent grid lock during long block game runs.
‚óè Classic Block Puzzle Flow: Familiar block logic blended with wooden visuals and steady pacing.
‚óè Offline Play: Enjoy the full block puzzle and wood block game experience without WiFi.

üåø Why Puzzle Fans Enjoy It
At its core, Block Crush is a classic block game focused on fitting blocks, clearing space, and maintaining a clean grid. If you enjoy block puzzle strategy, wood block puzzle clarity, or calm block-based brainteasers, this game offers a thoughtful and satisfying way to sharpen your mind.

title: Arrows ‚Äì Puzzle Escape
summary:
Welcome to Arrows ‚Äì Puzzle Escape, a minimalist puzzle game that challenges your logic, planning, and spatial thinking. Your goal is simple: extract each arrow without causing a collision.

üß† Features:
- Challenging logic puzzles that test your planning skills
- Thousands of handcrafted levels with increasing complexity
- Clean, minimalist design that lets you focus on the puzzle
- Relaxing, no-pressure gameplay ‚Äì no timers, just your brain
- Hint system to help when you're stuck

Whether you have a few minutes or want a longer challenge, Arrows ‚Äì Puzzle Escape is the perfect blend of strategy and calm.

Can you clear the grid without losing a single heart?

title: Roblox
summary:
ROBLOX ‚Äì PLAY, CREATE, AND EXPLORE MILLIONS OF EXPERIENCES

There‚Äôs something for everyone on Roblox. Whether you‚Äôre looking to explore, create, roleplay, compete, or hang out with friends, there's an endless amount of immersive experiences for you to discover. And even more are being made every day, all from a growing community of creators around the world.

Already have a Roblox account? Log in with your existing account and start exploring some of the most popular experiences from the Roblox community today, including Grow a Garden, Adopt Me!, Dress to Impress, SpongeBob Tower Defense, Brookhaven RP, How to Train Your Dragon, and more.

WHAT YOU CAN DO ON ROBLOX

DISCOVER ENDLESS EXPERIENCES
- Dive into adventures, role-playing games, simulators, obstacle courses, and more
- Explore trending experiences and fun, new games daily
- Compete in multiplayer battles, run your own business, or embark on epic quests

CREATE YOUR OWN AVATAR
- Customize your avatar with your favorite clothing, accessories, and hairstyles
- Discover thousands of user-created avatar items in the Marketplace
- Express yourself with unique animations and emotes

EXPLORE TOGETHER‚ÄîANYTIME, ANYWHERE
- Play on mobile, tablet, PC, console, and VR headsets
- Hang out and play with friends in multiplayer games across any device

CHAT AND PLAY WITH PEOPLE YOU KNOW
- Join a Party and jump into experiences together
- 13+ users can also chat via voice or text

CREATE, BUILD, AND SHARE
- Design games and virtual spaces using Roblox Studio on Windows or Mac
- Publish and share your experiences with millions of players

INDUSTRY-LEADING SAFETY AND CIVILITY
- Advanced content filtering and moderation
- Parental controls and account restrictions for younger players
- Clear community guidelines promoting respectful interactions
- Dedicated trust & safety teams working around the clock

WHY MILLIONS PLAY AND CREATE ON ROBLOX
- Immersive 3D multiplayer games and experiences
- Safe, inclusive environments for everyone
- A platform empowering anyone to become a creator
- New content added daily by a global community

title: Minecraft: Dream it, Build it!
summary:
Dive into an open world of building, crafting, and survival in the ultimate sandbox adventure. Gather resources, survive the night, and build a world one block at a time. Explore and craft your way through a completely open world where you can play with friends, new and old. Build a city, start a farm, mine deep underground, face mysterious enemies, or just experiment to the limits of your imagination in this expansive simulation!

Craft a new house, build cities, or start a farm. Bring your imagination to life and build your dream world where the possibilities are endless. Adventure through your own online game and play with friends, building from the ground up in our crafting simulation. In Creative mode, enjoy unlimited resources and the freedom of superior building and crafting. In Survival mode, survive the night, face intense battles, craft tools, and fend off danger. With seamless cross-platform and multiplayer gameplay on Minecraft: Bedrock Edition, you can adventure solo or with friends and discover an infinite, randomly generated world filled with blocks to mine, biomes to explore, and mobs to befriend (or battle) in a universe of crafting!

In Minecraft, the world is yours to shape!


BUILD YOUR DREAM WORLD

‚Ä¢ Build a house or create an entire world from the ground up

‚Ä¢ Building games for kids, adults, or anyone

‚Ä¢ Craft and build from special resources and tools to create brand new structures and landscapes

‚Ä¢ Explore an endless open world simulation full of different biomes and creatures

‚Ä¢ Minecraft Marketplace ‚Äì Get creator-made add-ons, thrilling worlds, and stylish cosmetics on Minecraft Marketplace

‚Ä¢ Private and community servers ‚Äì Online games allow you to connect with millions of players, or subscribe to Realms Plus to cross-play with up to 10 friends on your own private server

‚Ä¢ Slash commands ‚Äì Tweak how the game plays: you can change the weather, summon mobs, change the time of day, and more

‚Ä¢ Add-ons ‚Äì Block builders can customize their experience even further with add-ons as they build up! If you're more tech-inclined, you can modify your game to create new resource packs


MULTIPLAYER ONLINE GAMES

‚Ä¢ Join free massive multiplayer servers and play with thousands of other builders

‚Ä¢ Multiplayer servers allow you to play with up to 4 players online with a free Xbox Live account

‚Ä¢ Explore endless realms. With Realms and Realms Plus, you can play with up to 10 friends cross-platform, anytime, anywhere on Realms, your own private server that we host for you

‚Ä¢ Customize your world with Realms Plus. Get instant access to an extensive catalogue that is refreshed every month! Share with friends on your own private Realms server*

‚Ä¢ MMO servers allow you to connect and play with players across the world, to explore custom worlds, build with friends, and participate in large-scale events

‚Ä¢ Enjoy crafting buildings, building gigantic community-run worlds, competing in unique mini-games, and socializing in lobbies full of fellow Minecraft block builders


SUPPORT: https://www.minecraft.net/help


LEARN MORE: https://www.minecraft.net/


MINIMUM RECOMMENDED SPECIFICATION


To check the requirements for your device visit: https://help.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/4409172223501


*Realms & Realms Plus: Try a free 30-day trial in-app.
recentChanges: What's new in 1.21.131: Various bug fixes!

title: Geometry Dash
summary:
Jump and fly your way through danger in this rhythm-based action platformer!

Prepare for a near impossible challenge in the world of Geometry Dash. Push your skills to the limit as you jump, fly and flip your way through dangerous passages and spiky obstacles.

Simple one touch game play with lots of levels that will keep you entertained for hours!

Game Features

‚Ä¢ Rhythm-based Action Platforming!
‚Ä¢ Lots of levels with unique soundtracks!
‚Ä¢ Build and share your own levels using the level editor!
‚Ä¢ Unlock new icons and colors to customize your character!
‚Ä¢ Fly rockets, flip gravity and much more!
‚Ä¢ Use practice mode to sharpen your skills!
‚Ä¢ Lots of achievements and rewards!
‚Ä¢ No in-app purchases!
‚Ä¢ Challenge yourself with the near impossible!

Contact: support@robtopgames.com
recentChanges:

- Event levels and chests!
- New achievements and rewards
- New song trigger options
- Bugfixes and optimizations
- Secrets...

title: CloverPit
summary:
Clover Pit is a demonic rogue-lite that traps players in a hell of their own creation. Locked in a rusty cell with a slot machine and an ATM, you must pay off your debt at the end of each round, or fall to ruin ‚Äì literally!

Manipulate the slot machine to earn extra coins. Turn the odds in your favor with various prizes and charms that trigger big big combos, snowballing into a dazzling lucky run. Bend the rules, break the game, and pay off your captor long enough to earn a shot at freedom.

Features:
- A gripping rogue-lite where every round could be your last!
- Meta-progression, multiple endings and unlockable power-ups!
- Push your score to new heights in Endless Mode!
- A hellish escape room atmosphere!
- 150 + items and synergies to boost your luck!
- A sinister tale of addiction and escape!

Note on Save Data: This game currently stores progress locally on your device. Please be aware that uninstalling the app (or clearing app data) will delete your save file. Cloud Save & Cross-Device Sync are in development for a future update.

P.S. IS THIS GAMBLING?
No! CloverPit is a rogue-lite horror game, and not a slot machine simulator. Our slot machine is designed to be broken and ultimately overcome, and will never ask you for real money!
recentChanges:
Added Video settings options
- Resolution: 360p up to native
- Auto resolution mode which reduces / increases resolution depending on current performance
- Target FPS: choose between 30 and 60 fps

title: Balatro
summary:
Welcome to the official Balatro game!

Hypnotic and endlessly satisfying, Balatro is a magical mix of card games like Solitaire and Poker, that lets you twist the rules in ways never seen before!

Your goal is to beat Boss Blinds by making strong poker hands.
Find new Jokers that change the game and create awesome and exciting combos! Take on challenging bosses, discover wild poker hands and unlock new decks as you play.

You‚Äôll need all the help you can get to beat the big boss, win the final challenge, and win the game.

Features:

* Remastered controls for touch screen devices; now even more satisfying!
* Each run is different: every pick-up, discard and joker can dramatically alter the course of your run.
* Multiple game items: discover over 150 Jokers, each with special powers. Use them with different decks,upgrade cards and vouchers to boost your scores.
* Different Game modes: Campaign mode and challenge mode for you to play.
* Beautiful Pixel Art: Immerse yourself in the CRT fuzz and enjoy detailed, hand-crafted pixel art.

title: Five Nights at Freddy's
summary:
NOTE: Remastered version from the PC version. A device with at least 2 GB of RAM is required for this game to run properly.

Welcome to your new summer job at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza, where kids and parents alike come for entertainment and food as far as the eye can see! The main attraction is Freddy Fazbear, of course; and his two friends. They are animatronic robots, programmed to please the crowds! The robots' behavior has become somewhat unpredictable at night however, and it was much cheaper to hire you as a security guard than to find a repairman.

From your small office you must watch the security cameras carefully. You have a very limited amount of electricity that you're allowed to use per night (corporate budget cuts, you know). That means when you run out of power for the night- no more security doors and no more lights! If something isn't right- namely if Freddybear or his friends aren't in their proper places, you must find them on the monitors and protect yourself if needed!

Can you survive five nights at Freddy's?

NOTE: Interface and audio in English. Subtitles in English, French, German, Dutch, Spanish (Latin America), Italian, Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Japanese, Chinese (Simplified), Korean.

#MadeWithFusion
recentChanges:
- Updated the Google Play Billing library
- Updated the target API level

title: MONOPOLY GO!
summary:
The wizarding world awaits! Hit GO! Roll the dice with the witches and wizards of Harry Potter! Earn MONOPOLY money, interact with your friends, family members and fellow Tycoons from around the world as you explore the expanding universe of MONOPOLY GO - now even more magical, welcoming iconic Hogwarts witches and wizards like Harry Potter, Albus Dumbledore, Hermione Granger, Severus Snape and many more! It‚Äôs the new way to play - board flipping cleanup not required!

Unlock magical maps! Discover Hogwarts Treasures!

Escape, enjoy, dream, scheme and stay in touch with this newly reimagined Harry Potter twist on MONOPOLY! Let everyone's favorite zillionaire, Mr. MONOPOLY, be your guide as you enjoy your favorite Harry Potter moments and Hogwarts maps like Hogsmeade, the Forbidden Forest or Diagon Alley.

So MONOPOLY GO!

Experience classic fun and visuals with gameplay fit for your phone! Collect Properties, build Houses and Hotels, pull Chance Cards, and of course, earn that MONOPOLY Money! Play with your favorite game Tokens such as the Racecar, Top Hat, Battleship, and more. Earn more tokens as you go - your favorite Harry Potter wizard or witch might be one!

See MONOPOLY icons like Mr. M, Scottie and Ms. MONOPOLY come to life, and brand new characters too!

Your Family Table!

Help or hinder! - You and friends can earn easy money with Community Chest and co-op events! Or heist their banks to help yourself get to the top.

The Hogwarts Express has arrived!

Collect and trade story-filled stickers with friends and family and in our MONOPOLY GO! Facebook Trading Groups! Complete the magical Harry Potter-themed album for huge rewards! Every collection features great wizards and witches, and takes you through iconic places across Hogwarts.

Features!

BUY & BUILD YOUR WAY TO THE TOP

Collect Property Tile Sets to build Houses and upgrade your Houses to Hotels to get even more rent from friends! All you have to do is hit GO! Can you catch the golden snitch?

ENJOY THAT CLASSIC MONOPOLY ATMOSPHERE

Roll the dice to enjoy the classic MONOPOLY board you know and love. Featuring familiar faces such as MR. MONOPOLY, and familiar spaces such as jail (womp womp!), Railroads, Properties, Tokens and more!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS AND FAMILY

Get social! Play with friends to take full advantage of new magical mini-games such as Community Chest ‚Äì where you and friends take a break from mischief and work together!

NEW OPPORTUNITIES EVERY DAY

Play Tournaments, the Prize Drop plinko mini-game, the Cash Grab mini-game and follow our Events for big rewards. With Harry Potter entering the world of MONOPOLY GO! mini-games are even more magical and fun! Roll into the wizarding world now and discover the magic of Harry Potter.

MONOPOLY GO! is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. Internet connection is required to play the game.

The MONOPOLY name and logo, the distinctive design of the game board, the four corner squares, the MR. MONOPOLY name and character, as well as each of the distinctive elements of board and playing pieces are trademarks of Hasbro, Inc. for its property trading game and game equipment. ¬© 1935, 2023 Hasbro.

title: Last War:Survival Game
summary:
A global zombie infestation has converted many into zombies. As a survivor, your primary goal is to retain your humanity and survive.

- Think Fast, Move Faster!
Begin your journey with an intense survival challenge. Dodge and combat waves of zombies. It's not just about survival; it's about quick reflexes and strategic thinking, as each lane presents unique obstacles and zombies!

- Create Your Zombie-Free Shelter
Customize your base and expand your army - you are the light in this shelter, leading people towards a glimmer of hope. In this strategic game, your choices in building and developing your base will shape the future of your survivors in a world overrun by zombies.

- Assemble Your Dream Team
Assemble your ultimate team by recruiting heroes. With a choice of three military branches, each hero comes with their own unique skills. Combine different heroes to easily achieve victory against the zombies.

- Unite for the Greater Good
In the challenging world of zombies, survival is a team effort. Partner with players from all over the globe to battle the zombies. Stay alert ‚Äì alliances are complex, and not every survivor you encounter is friendly.

How long can you last in this apocalypse? Join Last War: Survival Game and embark on a thrilling journey of survival and strategy!
recentChanges:
What‚Äôs New:
Added birthday system. Commanders will receive a birthday card and special rewards from the system on their set birthday! The Commander's avatar will also have special birthday effects on their birthday, and when other Commanders give them likes, they will send birthday wishes.

title: Candy Crush Saga
summary:
Explore a world full of delicious match-3 puzzles and endless fun! Blast through thousands of challenging levels in this timeless puzzle game from King. Match candies, conquer jelly, toffees, and jam, and uncover sweet surprises in every puzzle.

Classic Match-3 Gameplay with Fresh Twists

- Discover unique game modes like Gummy Dragons and Bubblegum Pop.
- Match and blast your way through matching levels full of sugar-coated fun.
- Master tricky puzzles and create explosive combos to clear the board!

Brain-Boosting Challenges & Special Events

- Daily Rewards: Log in every day to claim free boosters and extra lives.
- Time-Limited Events: Compete in themed challenges and win exclusive prizes.
- Tournaments & Leaderboards: Crush more candies than your friends and rise to the top to become the ultimate match-3 master!

Bonbon Blitz Your Way Through Extra Sticky Levels

- Use powerful boosters like Bonbon Blitz, Lollipop Hammer, and Jelly Fish to solve puzzles and boost your score.
- Stuck on a level? Boosters and extra moves will help you blast through any obstacle.

Play Offline or Online, Anytime and Anywhere

- No internet, no problem: Enjoy offline gameplay and keep the fun going wherever you are.
- Ad-free fun means uninterrupted candy-matching bliss!

Connect with Friends & Join the Candy Kingdom

- Share lives, compare scores, and see who‚Äôs the match-3 master in your friends circle.
- Connect your game to Facebook to sync progress, compete with friends, and unlock exclusive rewards!

Discover more from King

Looking for more brain-teasing fun? Try Candy Crush Soda Saga or Farm Heroes Saga for fresh twists on classic match-3 puzzles. Or dive into sweet solitaire action with the new Candy Crush Solitaire!

Candy Crush Saga is free to play, but optional in-game items require payment. You can turn off the payment feature in your device‚Äôs settings.
recentChanges:
We hope you‚Äôre having fun playing Candy Crush Saga! We update the game every week so don't forget to download the latest version to get all the sweet new features and levels!

New to the game? Don‚Äôt be shy, join the fun!

Coming back after a break? About time!

Let‚Äôs play!

title: Royal Match
summary:
Welcome to Royal Match, the king of puzzle games! Swipe colors, solve match-3 puzzles and help King Robert decorate his castle. An exciting adventure is calling you!

We have thousands of challenging match-3 levels for you to play in the Royal Arena! On this fun journey, you will solve exciting puzzles, receive coins for unlocking new areas, decorate King Robert‚Äôs castle and get extra boosters to continue your saga. Also you can compete with millions of players in events such as King's Cup, Sky Race, Team Battle, Lightning Rush and claim exciting rewards for your achievements. Fun and challenge never ends and you will never have a dull moment in Royal Match.

And BOOM! It is 100% ad free and no wifi needed - internet free.

Jump into the adventure and play now! We have lots of sweet puzzles to enjoy. Each new episode comes with free coins, helpful boosters, surprising awards, challenging tasks and wonderful areas.

- A unique match 3 gameplay and fun levels for both masters and new match 3 players!
- Unlock and blast powerful boosters!
- Collect loads of coins and special treasures in bonus levels!
- Watch out for obstacles on the road such as birds, boxes, potions, cupboards, diamonds, magic hats, coin safes, mysterious mailboxes and piggy!
- Open amazing chests for a chance to win coins, boosters, unlimited life and power-ups!
- Explore the new rooms, royal chambers, splendid gardens, and many more exciting areas in King Robert‚Äôs castle!
- Decorate the areas, including the King‚Äôs room, kitchen, garden, garage, and many other amazing rooms!
- Challenge your friends on Facebook and reach the top of the leaderboards!

Download now and start swapping for endless fun.

Need some help? Visit our support page in the Royal Match app or send us a message at contact@dreamgames.com.
recentChanges:
Are you ready for a fun new update?
‚Ä¢ Get ready for amazing 100 NEW LEVELS! Unpack and match your way to victory with the SYMBOL PACK!
‚Ä¢ Explore the NEW AREA! Discover frosty fun and festive finds in the WINTER MARKET!
New levels are coming in every two weeks! Be sure to update your game to get the latest content!
